spiritsExplanation:
The workout is primarily classified as 'Soothing & Restorative' due to its focus on relieving post-row tension and connecting movement with breath, as indicated by phrases like 'Open areas of your body' and 'connect your movement and breath.' The music choice (Chill low, Cool/Downtempo) and the playlist featuring relaxing tracks contribute to this spirit, assigning it a high score of 0.9.

The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is also present, as the session emphasizes connection of movement and breath, characteristic of a rhythmic flow. This is further supported by the music which tends to enhance the rhythmic component of workouts, scoring a 0.6.

The outdoor setting seen in the image suggests an 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit, although it is not the session's primary focus. The natural urban environment adds an exploratory element, thus earning a score of 0.5 for this spirit.
